entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain mixed with snow late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023
